DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS AND EXPECT CLOVERFIELD, IT IS NOT AN ACTION FILM.

Its a scifi drama. Its a brilliant drama but those downloading this hoping for some humans vs aliens butt kicking are always going to be disappointed.

Understandable why some people are annoyed though, the trailer did make it look like it would be a massive humans vs aliens battle but its not, its about the relationship between the two main cast members (the only professional actors in it), it just happens to be set in a world where there are lots of aliens knocking about.
Excellent Copy 10/10! The movie could of been better but it was alright, bit like cloverfield I thought as well.

This film is extremely well done and believable. Action is sparse and long abandoned sites of battle are abundant, making for a suspenseful and eery watch.  Character interaction is complete and well rounded.  Quite the unexpected romance, but not in the horrible hollywood way I have experienced before
